page.title: 14BONAR BRIDGE SALMON QUEEN
page.content: {The Salmon Queen Week}was started in the 1950s by two local residents. This year it starts around the{27th July. Each year a young local girl is chosen as the{Salmon Queen.}She is taken by boat across the{Kyle to Bonar where she is crowned. She has three attendants, two girls and one boy. There is a procession led by the Pipe Band. Decorated floats follow, one carrying the Salmon Queen and attendants. During the week there are special events such as{sports , competions and {dances.}Each local club is supposed to organise one event. At the end of the week all the prizes are given. This year the events are only going to last for two days instead of a week.
